translations.de: sein, bin, bist, ist, sind (Kopula, Verb der Existenz)
translations.fr: être | ([utilisé avec un mot au datif pour former le v.] avoir)

meaning_note:
Used in three ways:
  1. to indicate something has a property (‘A is B’); in this case the predicate can be a noun or an adjective
  2. to indicate existence (‘there is, there exists’)
  3. to indicate possession, with the possessor in the dative (‘to A is B’ → ‘A has B’)
